categories.true_divergence: Meanings evolved differently over centuries in both languages
categories.simplification_merge: Confusion exists because Simplified Chinese merged distinct Traditional characters
categories.japanese_coinage: Word invented/repurposed in Meiji-era Japan, borrowed back to China
categories.scope_difference: Same core meaning but different range of usage

jp_meanings: [JP only] 照明具の一。足元を照らすために持ち歩いたり、標識として備えつけたりするもの。初めは木枠や籠 (かご) に紙を張ったものであったが、のち、細い竹ひごの骨に紙を張り、中にろうそくを立てて用い、折り畳めるようにした。形・用途によって小田原提灯・箱提灯・高張り提灯など各種ある。。

cn_meanings_traditional: [CN only] ランプをぶら下げる。

jp_meanings: [JP only] 偶蹄 (ぐうてい) 目キリン科の哺乳類。首と脚が長く、頭頂までの高さは6メートルに達し、アカシアなど高木の葉を食べる。舌が長く、雌雄とも角をもつ。体表は黄白色の地に栗色・砂色などの斑があり、網目模様に見える。アミメキリン・マサイキリンなどの亜種があり、アフリカに分布。ジラフ。中国名、長頸鹿。。
cn_meanings_simplified: [CN only] 古代の伝説上の動物；聖人が世に出る時に現われる。体形は鹿、蹄 (ひづめ) は馬、尾は牛に似て、頭に1本の角があり、全身から5色の光を放つという。一説に、麒は雄、麟は雌という。神獣の一つ
cn_meanings_traditional: [CN only] 古代の伝説上の動物；聖人が世に出る時に現われる。体形は鹿、蹄 (ひづめ) は馬、尾は牛に似て、頭に1本の角があり、全身から5色の光を放つという。一説に、麒は雄、麟は雌という。神獣の一つ
false_friends.explanation: Completely different meanings: JP '偶蹄 (ぐうてい) 目キリン科の哺乳類。首と脚が長く、頭頂までの高さは6メートルに達し、アカシアなど高木の葉を食べる。舌が長く、雌雄とも角をもつ。体表は黄白色の地に栗色・砂色などの斑があり、網目模様に見える。アミメキリン・マサイキリンなどの亜種があり、アフリカに分布。ジラフ。中国名、長頸鹿。。' vs CN '古代の伝説上の動物；聖人が世に出る時に現われる。体形は鹿、蹄 (ひづめ) は馬、尾は牛に似て、頭に1本の角があり、全身から5色の光を放つという。一説に、麒は雄、麟は雌という。神獣の一つ'

jp_meanings: daughter

girl
false_friends.jp_example_translation: My daughter is five years old.
cn_meanings_simplified: mother
mom
elderly woman
cn_meanings_traditional: young woman
girl (matches Japanese)
false_friends.cn_example_translation: Mother's cooking is the most delicious.
false_friends.explanation: This is a SIMPLIFICATION ARTIFACT. Traditional Chinese has two separate characters: 娘 (young woman) and 孃 (mother). Simplified Chinese merged them both into 娘. Japanese preserved the original meaning of 娘 (young woman/daughter). For Traditional Chinese readers, this is NOT a false friend.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: Simplified merged 孃→娘. Japanese kept the original 娘 = young woman.
false_friends.traditional_note: Traditional Chinese distinguishes 娘 (young woman) from 孃 (mother). Japanese matches the original 娘 meaning.

cn_meanings_simplified: toilet paper

false_friends.cn_example_translation: The toilet paper in the bathroom ran out.
false_friends.explanation: True meaning divergence. In Chinese, 手紙 literally means 'hand paper' (toilet paper). Japanese adopted it to mean written correspondence. This affects both Simplified and Traditional Chinese speakers.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: In Japan, you write ON paper (letter). In China, you wipe WITH paper.

false_friends.mnemonic_tip: JP: A STURDY thing. CN: A HUSBAND (hopefully sturdy too).

jp_meanings: 雑誌など定期刊行物の、それぞれの一冊をいう；学者・文人・画家などが本名のほかに用いる名。雅号；数詞に付いて、順序を示すのに用いる；乗り物や動物などの名前に付いて、それが名称であることを示す；新聞・雑誌など定期刊行物で、発行の順・月・季節や種別などに付いて、どのような種類のものであるかを示す。助数詞として用いることもある；衣服のサイズを示すのに用いる。宇宙号、1号室、号数

[CN only] 人数を数える；集団における傷病者の数を数える；句読点；大声で泣く

jp_meanings: 干: dry, shield
幹: trunk, main
cn_meanings_simplified: gān: dry, shield
gàn: do, trunk (all written 干)
cn_meanings_traditional: 干: shield
幹: trunk/do
乾: dry (separate)
false_friends.cn_example: 干燥 / 干部 / 干活
false_friends.explanation: SIMPLIFICATION ARTIFACT - the most confusing merge. Three distinct Traditional characters became one. 干 can mean dry (乾), do/work (幹), or shield (干). Context and tone distinguish them. Japanese kept 乾 and 幹 separate.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: Simplified 干 is doing triple duty. Context is everything.
false_friends.traditional_note: The most complex merge: Traditional has 干 (shield/stem), 幹 (trunk/do), and 乾 (dry). All merged into 干 in Simplified.

approximately

approximately
everyone (high and low)

jp_meanings: 雲: cloud
cn_meanings_simplified: cloud
to say (classical, merged)
cn_meanings_traditional: 云: to say (classical)
雲: cloud (separate)
false_friends.explanation: SIMPLIFICATION ARTIFACT. Traditional 雲 (cloud) was simplified to 云, which already existed meaning 'to say' (classical). Japanese uses 雲 for cloud.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: Simplified: same character, context tells you if it's clouds or quotation.
false_friends.traditional_note: Traditional has 云 (to say, classical) and 雲 (cloud). Simplified uses 云 for both.

entry
beginning stage

cn_meanings_traditional: entrance
entry
to put in mouth (medical)

false_friends.mnemonic_tip: JP: Entry point (physical or figurative). CN: Entry point (physical or oral).

false_friends.jp_reading: はつ (hatsu) — 発 / かみ (kami) — 髪
jp_meanings: 発: emit, departure
髪: hair
false_friends.jp_example: 出発する。/ 髪を切る。
cn_meanings_simplified: fā: emit, send, issue
fà: hair (same character 发)
cn_meanings_traditional: 發 fā: emit, send
髮 fà: hair (separate)
false_friends.cn_example: 发出信号。/ 我要剪头发。
false_friends.cn_example_translation: To emit a signal. / I want to cut my hair.
false_friends.explanation: SIMPLIFICATION ARTIFACT. Traditional has 發 (emit, fā) and 髮 (hair, fà) as separate characters. Simplified merged both into 发 (distinguished only by tone). Japanese simplified differently: 發→発, 髮→髪 (still separate).
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: CN simplified merged them by sound. JP simplified kept them separate by meaning.
false_friends.traditional_note: Traditional Chinese distinguishes 發 (emit/send) from 髮 (hair). Simplified merged both into 发.

jp_meanings: after
behind
later
cn_meanings_simplified: after
behind
queen/empress (merged)
cn_meanings_traditional: 後: after/behind
后: queen/empress (separate)
false_friends.cn_example: 皇后很美丽。/ 之后再说。
false_friends.cn_example_translation: The empress is beautiful. / Let's talk about it later.
false_friends.explanation: SIMPLIFICATION ARTIFACT. Traditional Chinese has 后 (queen) and 後 (after) as separate characters. Simplified merged them into 后. Japanese uses 後 for 'after' (matching Traditional CN).
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: Simplified merged 後→后. Now 后 means both 'queen' AND 'after' in Simplified.
false_friends.traditional_note: Traditional Chinese distinguishes 后 (queen/empress) from 後 (behind/after). Japanese uses 後 for 'after'.

to examine oneself critically

false_friends.explanation: JP 検討 is neutral 'consideration/review.' CN 检讨 implies self-criticism or admitting fault.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: JP: Review an IDEA. CN: Review YOURSELF (critically).

jp_meanings: facial expression
atmosphere/mood of a place
false_friends.jp_example: 各地の正月の表情をお伝えしましょう。
false_friends.jp_example_translation: Let's report on the New Year atmosphere in various places.
cn_meanings_simplified: facial expression
cn_meanings_traditional: facial expression
false_friends.explanation: Both mean 'facial expression.' JP additionally uses 表情 for the atmosphere/mood of a place - CN does not.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: JP has an extra meaning: the 'expression' of a place.

warm

warm

inquiry (neutral)

to interrogate

cn_meanings_traditional: to question
to interrogate
to challenge
false_friends.explanation: JP 質問 is a neutral 'question.' CN 质问 has a more aggressive tone - to interrogate or challenge. CN uses 问题 (wèntí) for neutral questions.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: JP: Asking a QUESTION. CN: INTERROGATING someone.

false_friends.jp_reading: り (ri) — 里 / うら (ura) — 裏
jp_meanings: 里: village, ri (unit)
裏: inside, back, reverse
cn_meanings_simplified: village
inside (merged)
half-kilometer
cn_meanings_traditional: 里: village, li (unit)
裏/裡: inside (separate)
false_friends.explanation: SIMPLIFICATION ARTIFACT. Traditional has 里 (village) and 裏/裡 (inside) separate. Simplified uses 里 for both. Japanese keeps them separate (里 vs 裏).
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: JP: 里 = village, 裏 = inside. Simplified CN: 里 = both.
false_friends.traditional_note: Traditional Chinese distinguishes 里 (village/unit of distance) from 裏/裡 (inside). Simplified merged into 里.

jp_meanings: 面: face, surface, mask
麺: noodles
cn_meanings_simplified: face
surface
noodles (merged)
cn_meanings_traditional: 面: face/surface
麵: noodles (separate)
false_friends.explanation: SIMPLIFICATION ARTIFACT. Traditional distinguishes 面 (face) from 麵 (noodles). Simplified uses 面 for both. Japanese uses 麺 for noodles.
false_friends.mnemonic_tip: In Simplified, your face and your noodles are the same character.
false_friends.traditional_note: Traditional has 面 (face/surface) and 麵 (noodles/flour). Simplified uses 面 for both.
